code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import"./codingPage.scss";import{SrcDocContext}from"../../context/SrcDocContext";import{SelectedViewContext}from"../../context/SelectedView";import CodeOutputTop from"../../components/CodeOutput/CodeOutput";import CodeOutputSide from"../../components/CodeOutput/CodeOutputSide";import CodeEditorTop from"../../components/CodeEditor/CodeEditor";import CodeEditorSide from"../../components/CodeEditor/CodeEditorSide";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function CodingPage(){const{srcDocVal}=useContext(SrcDocContext);const{selectedView}=React.useContext(SelectedViewContext);const TopView=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"codingPage",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"codingPage-main-container1",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CodeEditorTop,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"codingPage-main-container2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CodeOutputTop,{srcDoc:srcDocVal})})]});};const LeftView=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"codingPage1",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"codingPage-main-container3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CodeEditorSide,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"codingPage-main-container4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CodeOutputSide,{srcDoc:srcDocVal})})]});};const RightView=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"codingPage2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"codingPage-main-container3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CodeEditorSide,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"codingPage-main-container4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CodeOutputSide,{srcDoc:srcDocVal})})]});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[selectedView==="top"?TopView():null,selectedView==="left"?LeftView():null,selectedView==="right"?RightView():null]});}
